infos.value: By using Auto Formation, you can form parties with your strongest units automatically selected.
It looks like your formation went smoothly.
Make use of this feature while you are getting acquainted with forming parties, or simply when you wish to create a formation as quickly as possible.
The members of your party have been chosen. Next, let us choose a companion.
Companions are essentially mercenaries. We can pay them gil to have them fight alongside us.
Now our party is full formation. Shall we set the auto function to "ON"? The auto setting can be switched on or off even mid-battle.
We can set the speed of the battle to 1.5x by navigating to the battle setting.
The speed is set to 1.5x by default, but you can change the speed by tapping the dropdown list.

• Auto Formation •
Auto Formation automatically forms the optimal party based on your preselected preferences.
You can pay <color=#00ffff>gil</color> to invite <color=#00ffff>another player's</color> <color=#00ffff>unit</color> to <color=#00ffff>accompany</color> you on your quest.
Normally, you must pay gil to acquire a companion, but this time only you may do so <color=#00ffff>for free</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on Formations?
